definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[חרה]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. d.ara0 (w, y) of vein, run blood, bleed, d.arwun) an odorif. tree, or its gum, cf. Hom:A. und A. i. 4, Sab. [[חַרו]] SabDenkm:83; (Syr. s.arwo0 fructus pini, etc. is loan-word); NH = BH; as to form cp. Gk. stu/rac (hardly ‖ in meaning, Lag:M. i. 234, 384, v. Ency. Bib. infr.), cf. Lewy:Fremdw. 41).
